mutants.code:
def max_friendship_factor(n, d, friends):
    friends.sort()
    (l, h) = (0, 0)
    f = 1
    f_m = 0
    while h < len(friends):
        if friends[h][0] - friends[l][0] >= d:
            f -= friends[l][1]
            l += 1
        else:
            f += friends[h][1]
            h += 1
        f_m = max(f_m, f)
    return f_m
